archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.2.7a: a) information stored in digital form (e.g. using electronic watermarking, labelling headers and footers, embedding labels in metadata (such as document properties) and using filename conventions)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
